args_list.text_pair: str or List[str] or List[int] or None = None
args_list.padding: bool or str or PaddingStrategy = False
args_list.truncation: bool or str or TruncationStrategy or None = None
args_list.return_tensors: str or TensorType or None = None

params.name: text
params.type: str, List[str] or List[int] the latter only for not-fast tokenizers
params.description: The first sequence to be encoded. This can be a string, a list of strings (tokenized string using thetokenize method) or a list of integers (tokenized string ids using the convert_tokens_to_idsmethod).

params.name: text_pair
params.description: Optional second sequence to be encoded. This can be a string, a list of strings (tokenized string usingthe tokenize method) or a list of integers (tokenized string ids using the convert_tokens_to_idsmethod).
params.default: str or List[str] or List[int] or None = None
